text: 🚨 Ukraine: Russian troops advance in eastern region 🇺🇦💥 Update: Russian forces making significant gains near Avdiivka, Bohdanivka and Bakhmut. 🤯 Ukraine's Defense Ministry denies capture of Bohdanivka, intense fighting ongoing. 🔥💪 Ukrainian commander-in-chief Oleksandr Syrskyi: Russian troops actively attacking Ukrainian positions in three areas of Donetsk region. 💢 Ukraine struggling with ammunition shortages, Russia has advantage in firepower and personnel. 🤔🌎 The world needs to take action! We can't let Russia continue its aggressive expansion.
